td.content: s:pt with C/O Blood for 6 days that is frequent. he is a male negotiator aged 30 yrs. he denies smoking Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 67 in, Weight 145 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, MRI Chest shows soft tissue mass occupying the medial side of the left upper arm a:Lymphedema p:administered Ammonium lactate lotion (12%) - 0.5 g BID, performed MRI Chest, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
